name: Dynamic Movement Line
description: Players perform dynamic movements over 15–20 yards (high knees, butt kicks, skips) to raise core temperature.
progressions: Add ball at feet on return; add reaction cue (color/number).

name: Rondo Warm-Up 4v1
description: Keep-away in a small grid to activate passing rhythm and scanning.
key_coaching_points: Open body shape;One/two touch;Move after pass
progressions: Increase to 5v2; reduce grid size; touch limit.
regressions: Increase grid size; allow unlimited touches.

name: Tag With Ball
description: Players dribble in a grid while 1–2 taggers try to tag. Tagged players do a quick task then rejoin.
progressions: Weak-foot only; add safe zones with limits.
regressions: Walk tempo; bigger grid; fewer taggers.

name: Activation: Hops + Stick
description: Single-leg hops with controlled landings to prep ankles/knees for cutting and contact.
progressions: Add lateral hops; add partner bump on landing.

name: Juggling Ladder
description: Players juggle and try to beat personal bests (thigh/foot) to wake up touch and coordination.
key_coaching_points: Relaxed ankle;Eyes up between touches;Quick reset after drops
progressions: Weak-foot minimum; add move after every 3 juggles.

name: Partner Mirror Footwork
description: Pairs face each other; leader moves laterally/forward/back while partner mirrors to prep defensive feet.
key_coaching_points: Low center of gravity;Quick small steps;Stay balanced
progressions: Add ball for leader; add feints.

name: Two-Color Reaction Dribble
description: Players dribble freely; on coach call of a color they accelerate to that cone and stop ball under control.
key_coaching_points: Explode on cue;Stop ball cleanly;Scan while dribbling
progressions: Fake call; add task at cone (turn, pass).

name: Mobility Circuit (Hips/Ankles)
description: Short mobility stations (open gate, lunges, ankle rocks) to improve range of motion.
progressions: Add mini-band resistance; add pauses at end-range.

name: Passing Gates Warm-Up
description: Pairs pass through cone gates and rotate to a new gate after a set number of passes.
key_coaching_points: Plant foot beside ball;Firm pass;First touch out of feet
progressions: One-touch only; smaller gates; weaker foot.
regressions: Bigger gates; allow trap and pass.

name: 3v1 Keep-Away Warm-Up
description: Small rondo to prime quick decisions and support angles.
key_coaching_points: Create triangles;Play away from pressure;Scan before receiving
progressions: Add touch limit; add second defender.
regressions: Increase grid size; remove touch limit.

name: Shadow Dribble Stretch
description: Slow dribble while mixing gentle dynamic stretches to loosen up without losing touch.
progressions: Add turns at markers; add weak foot sections.

name: Rondo Warm-Up 5v2
description: Higher-tempo rondo with two defenders to force quicker decisions and cleaner first touches.
key_coaching_points: Check shoulders;One-touch when possible;Create passing angles
progressions: Reduce grid; add scoring rule (10 passes = point).

name: Circle Passing + Call Name
description: Players in a circle pass while calling receiver’s name to encourage communication and scanning.
progressions: Add one-touch; add second ball.

name: Dribble + Turn Circuit
description: Players dribble between cones performing a different turn at each cone (inside cut, outside cut, pullback).
key_coaching_points: Sharp turns;Accelerate after turn;Use both feet
progressions: Add feints; add time challenge.

name: Light Possession 6v3
description: Larger rondo-style possession to activate team spacing and pressing cues.
progressions: Touch limit; smaller space.

name: Foundation Touches
description: Alternating inside-foot touches to develop rhythm and comfort on the ball.
key_coaching_points: Light touches;Stay on toes;Head up occasionally
progressions: Increase tempo; add movement forward/back; weak-foot emphasis.
regressions: Slow tempo; allow pauses; larger ball for young players.

name: Toe Taps
description: Alternating toe touches on top of the ball to improve balance and quick feet.
progressions: Add lateral travel; add speed bursts.
regressions: Hands on wall for balance; slower tempo.

name: Bell Touches
description: Tap ball side-to-side with the inside of both feet to build control and rhythm.
progressions: Add forward travel; add touch limit per side.

name: Sole Rolls (Side-to-Side)
description: Roll ball left-right with the sole to improve feel and foot strength.
key_coaching_points: Use whole sole;Keep ball close;Stay balanced
progressions: Add pull-push after each roll; travel forward.

name: Inside–Outside Touches (Same Foot)
description: Using one foot, push ball inside then outside repeatedly, then switch feet.
key_coaching_points: Soft touches;Knee bent;Use both feet equally
progressions: Add forward movement; increase speed; add feint.

name: V-Pulls
description: Pull ball back with sole then push diagonally forward to simulate creating space.
progressions: Add defender cone; chain two V-pulls then sprint.

name: Pull-Push Alternating Feet
description: Pull back with one foot and push forward with the other in a rhythm pattern.
key_coaching_points: Keep ball tight;Stay on toes;Smooth transfers
progressions: Increase tempo; add directional change every 5 reps.
regressions: Reduce tempo; allow stop between actions.

name: L-Turn Reps
description: Drag ball back then cut sideways in an L shape to turn away from pressure.
progressions: Add speed into move; add cone as defender; weak-foot only set.

name: Cruyff Turn Reps
description: Fake a pass/shot then drag ball behind standing leg to change direction.
key_coaching_points: Convincing fake;Use inside of foot;Explode after turn
progressions: Add sprint finish; chain with feint before turn.

name: Inside Cut + Outside Cut Alternation
description: Dribble to a cone then alternate inside cut and outside cut turns.
progressions: Add time challenge; add weak foot only rounds.
regressions: Increase distance between cones; slow tempo.

name: Figure-8 Dribble (Two Cones)
description: Dribble a figure-8 pattern around two cones focusing on close control.
key_coaching_points: Small touches near cone;Head up between turns;Use both feet
progressions: Reduce cone gap; add moves at each turn.
regressions: Widen cone gap; walk pace first.

name: Box Dribble (Four Cones)
description: Dribble around a square; perform a turn at each corner.
key_coaching_points: Turn tight;Use both feet;Accelerate after turn
progressions: Add assigned turns (pullback, Cruyff, L-turn).

name: Ronaldo Chop Reps
description: Outside-of-foot chop across body while hopping to shift weight and change direction.
key_coaching_points: Sell the feint;Touch across body;Explode after chop
progressions: Add approach at speed; add finish after chop.
regressions: Practice slow; reduce hop; larger space.

name: Scissors Reps
description: Circular leg movement around ball to sell direction change.
key_coaching_points: Big sell;Stay balanced;Push ball past 'defender' cone
progressions: Double scissors; add sprint out; weak foot set.

name: Step-Over Reps
description: Stepping over the ball to disguise direction before pushing away.
key_coaching_points: Sell with shoulders;Plant and push;Accelerate out
progressions: Double step-over; add change of pace.
regressions: Start with stationary step-over; slower tempo.

name: Drag Back (Sole) + Go
description: Pull ball back with sole then push forward to reset and accelerate.
progressions: Add angle exit; chain two drag backs.

name: Outside Touches (Laces) Line
description: Moving forward using outside-of-foot touches to build speed dribbling control.
progressions: Increase pace; add cone slalom with outside touches only.

name: Weak-Foot Only Touches
description: Any ball-mastery pattern performed using only weak foot to accelerate development.
progressions: Add time goals; add movement patterns.
regressions: Shorten sets; allow alternating feet between sets.

name: Sole + Inside Combos
description: Combo touches: sole roll into inside touch repeated in rhythm.
key_coaching_points: Smooth transitions;Keep ball under body;Head up
progressions: Increase speed; add travel forward.
regressions: Break combo into parts; slower tempo.

name: Sole Pull + Outside Push
description: Pull ball back with sole and push away with outside of foot to create separation.
key_coaching_points: Sharp outside push;Explode out;Sell the pull
progressions: Add cone defender; add finish or pass after move.

name: Tik-Tok Touches (Inside-Outside Alternating Feet)
description: Fast alternating inside-outside touches switching feet each contact to build elite rhythm.
progressions: Add travel; add 10-second max-out rounds.

name: Around-the-World (Coerver) Reps
description: Circling foot around the ball to train dexterity and comfort manipulating the ball.
progressions: Add forward movement; chain with push past cone.

name: Inside Touches Forward/Back
description: Inside touches moving forward then backward in a lane to sharpen control both directions.
progressions: Add stop/turn at end; add tempo changes.

name: Sole Roll + Pullback Turn
description: Roll ball across body then pull back into turn; repeat both directions.
progressions: Add cone defender; add time target.
regressions: Do roll only; then add turn later.

name: Touch Box (30-Second Rounds)
description: Inside/sole/outside touches inside a small box for timed rounds.
progressions: Shrink box; add weak foot rounds.

name: Coerver Cuts (Inside Cut Line)
description: Dribble forward and perform inside cuts at each cone to practice sharp direction changes.
progressions: Reduce spacing; add feint before cut.

name: Coerver Cuts (Outside Cut Line)
description: Dribble forward and perform outside cuts at each cone for outside-foot control.
key_coaching_points: Use pinky toe area;Keep ball close;Accelerate after cut
progressions: Add tempo changes; add weak foot sets.

name: Maradona Spins (Turn Reps)
description: Use sole to drag ball across body while spinning to turn away from pressure.
key_coaching_points: Stay low;Protect ball with body;Explode out
progressions: Add approach speed; add defender cone.

name: Outside-Inside (Zigzag) Lane
description: Zigzag down a lane using outside touch to push, inside to correct line.
progressions: Increase tempo; reduce cone distance.

name: Stop-Start Explosions
description: Dribble then stop ball dead, then explode forward on cue to train acceleration control.
key_coaching_points: Stop with sole;Big first step;Ball slightly ahead on sprint
progressions: Randomize cues; add turn after stop.

name: Wall Pass Control (One Touch)
description: Pass against a wall and control with one touch (inside, outside, sole) alternating surfaces.
key_coaching_points: Prep touch early;Soft first touch;Change surface often
progressions: Increase distance; add one-touch return; add weak foot.

name: Wall Pass – Two Touch Rhythm
description: Pass, control, pass in steady rhythm to build consistent first touch and passing technique.
key_coaching_points: Cushion touch;Plant foot;Strike through middle of ball
progressions: Alternate feet each rep; add half-turn before pass.

name: Receive Across Body (Pairs)
description: Receive pass across body to open up, then play to next cone/target.
key_coaching_points: Open hips;Scan before receiving;First touch into space
progressions: Add defender shadow; reduce space.

name: Half-Turn Receiving Line
description: Players receive with back to pressure, check shoulder, half-turn on first touch and accelerate.
key_coaching_points: Check shoulder early;Use far foot;Accelerate after touch
progressions: Add live defender; add time limit.

name: Aerial Control (Toss + Set)
description: Toss ball to self or partner; control with thigh/chest then settle to feet and play.
key_coaching_points: Soft surface;Absorb impact;Set ball into space
progressions: Add volley finish; add weak-foot set.

name: Receive + 2-Touch Direction Change
description: Receive, take first touch across body, second touch pass to next player in new direction.
key_coaching_points: Angle first touch;Scan next target;Firm pass
progressions: Add touch limit; add defender cone.

name: First Touch Into Gate
description: Player receives pass and first touch must enter a cone gate before next action.
progressions: Smaller gates; add one-touch finish after gate.
regressions: Bigger gates; allow 2 touches to enter.

name: Bounce Touch – One Bounce Control
description: Drop ball, let it bounce once, then control with foot to stop or move into space.
progressions: Control into dribble then pass/shoot.

name: Receive Under Pressure (Shadow)
description: Receiver gets tight shadow pressure and must take first touch away and play out.
key_coaching_points: Use body to shield;Far-foot touch;Quick exit
progressions: Make pressure live; touch limit.

name: Turn & Receive (Check Away, Check To)
description: Player checks away from cone then checks to receive; first touch sets up next action.
progressions: Add defender; add one-touch layoff.

name: Receive on Back Foot (Open Touch)
description: Receive with back foot to play forward quickly.
key_coaching_points: Angle body;Back foot touch forward;Next action fast
progressions: Add pressure; reduce time.

name: Wall Receive Half-Turn
description: Pass to wall, receive on half-turn, accelerate two touches, repeat.
progressions: Add weak-foot only rounds; increase distance.
regressions: Do square receiving first; reduce speed.

name: First Touch + Finish (Rebounder/Wall)
description: Use wall/rebounder as passer; take first touch out of feet and finish into goal.
key_coaching_points: Prep body;Touch into shot line;Finish low and placed
progressions: One-touch finish; add target zones.

name: Receive & Switch (Long Touch Prep)
description: Receive then play longer pass to switch point; focus on first touch to set passing angle.
key_coaching_points: First touch out of feet;Strike through ball;Scan far target
progressions: Add pressure; longer distance.

name: Pressure Touch Escape (3-Second Rule)
description: Player must receive and exit box within 3 seconds to simulate fast decision windows.
progressions: Reduce time to 2 seconds; add live defender.

name: Cone Slalom Dribble
description: Dribble through cones focusing on close control and quick turns.
key_coaching_points: Small touches near cones;Use both feet;Head up between cones
progressions: Reduce cone spacing; add move at each cone.

name: Speed Dribble (Straight Line)
description: Dribble at speed in a lane with longer touches while keeping ball under control.
progressions: Add defender chase; add finish at end.

name: Change of Pace Dribble
description: Alternate slow control with explosive acceleration to beat defenders.
key_coaching_points: Sell the slow;Explode on cue;Control first two fast touches
progressions: Add move before acceleration; add time challenge.

name: 1v1 Gate Attack
description: Attacker tries to dribble through a cone gate while defender pressures and blocks.
progressions: Smaller gates; defender can tackle.
regressions: Bigger gates; defender is shadow only.

name: 1v1 Endline to Goal
description: Attacker starts wide and drives to goal; defender tries to delay and win ball.
progressions: Start closer to goal; add GK.

name: 2v1 Transition (Small Goal)
description: Two attackers vs one defender; focus on dribble to commit then pass or finish.
progressions: Add recovery defender; touch limit.

name: Shield & Spin (Pressure Cone)
description: Player shields from imaginary pressure then spins out with first touch.
key_coaching_points: Use arm for space;Low stance;Explode after spin
progressions: Add partner pressure; add exit to target.

name: Stop & Go (Defender Cone)
description: Approach cone, stop ball, fake, then accelerate past cone.
key_coaching_points: Sell fake;Big first step;Ball out of feet on sprint
progressions: Add move (step-over/scissors) before go.
regressions: No fake; just stop and go.

name: Zigzag Dribble With Targets
description: Zigzag at cones then accelerate into open space; repeat both directions.
key_coaching_points: Close control on zigzag;Explode between cones;Use both feet
progressions: Reduce spacing; add move at each cone.

name: 1v1 King of the Ring
description: Players dribble in a grid trying to knock others’ balls out while keeping their own.
progressions: Smaller grid; time rounds; add weak foot.

name: Move + Burst Ladder
description: Players perform a chosen move at cone then burst for 5–10 yards.
progressions: Add defender chase; chain two moves.

name: 1v1 Line Battle
description: Players start facing each other; attacker tries to dribble over endline while defender blocks.
progressions: Narrower channel; add time limit.

name: Tight Space Dribble Box
description: Dribble in a small box using many surfaces to build close control under pressure.
key_coaching_points: Many small touches;Scan;Use sole and outside
progressions: Shrink box; add timed rounds.

name: Skill Move Showcase (4 Moves)
description: Players cycle through four moves (scissors, step-over, L-turn, Cruyff) at stations.
progressions: Add weak-foot stations; add time goals.

name: 1v1 to Two Goals
description: Attacker can score in either goal, forcing defender to read hips and delay.
progressions: Add scoring zones; add touch limit for attacker.

name: Dribble + Pass Decision (2 Gates)
description: Attacker drives at defender; chooses to dribble through gate or pass to support option.
progressions: Add second defender; reduce time.

name: Winger 1v1 + Cross
description: Wide attacker beats defender then crosses into target zone for finish.
key_coaching_points: First touch forward;Change pace;Head up before cross
progressions: Add live finisher; add GK.

name: Central 1v1 + Finish
description: Attacker starts central and tries to create shot; defender focuses on delaying and tackling.
progressions: Add GK; limit touches.

name: Short Passing Pairs
description: Pairs pass back and forth focusing on firm, accurate passes and clean receiving touches.
key_coaching_points: Plant foot beside ball;Follow through;First touch out of feet
progressions: One-touch rounds; increase distance; weaker foot sets.

name: Triangle Passing (3-Man)
description: Three players pass and follow to create constant movement and angles.
progressions: One-touch only; add third-man run.

name: Give-and-Go (Wall Pass)
description: Pass to teammate, sprint around cone, receive return pass in stride.
key_coaching_points: Timing run;Weight of pass;Receive on the move
progressions: Add defender; one-touch layoff.

name: Passing Gates Rotation
description: Pairs score by completing passes through different cone gates around grid.
progressions: Touch limit; smaller gates; add defender.

name: One-Touch Bounce Passing
description: Players practice one-touch bounce passes to maintain tempo under pressure.
key_coaching_points: Soft first touch;Angle support;Pass with purpose
progressions: Add live defender; reduce space.

name: 4-Corner Passing Pattern
description: Ball moves around a square with specific receiving touches (inside, across body) and runs.
key_coaching_points: Receive on half-turn;Pass with correct foot;Timing of movement
progressions: Add second ball; add defender in middle.

name: Long Passing (Driven) Partners
description: Partners practice driven passes over longer distance with clean first touch.
key_coaching_points: Lock ankle;Strike through ball;First touch sets next pass
progressions: Add moving target; add weak-foot sets.

name: Switch Play Through Midfielder
description: Pattern: wide → mid → switch to opposite wide; teaches scanning and speed of circulation.
key_coaching_points: Scan far side;Body open;Pass with pace
progressions: Add passive then active defenders.

name: Rondo 5v2 (Possession)
description: Keep possession in tight grid with two defenders; rotate defenders frequently.
progressions: Touch limit; shrink grid.

name: Rondo 4v2 + End Zone
description: Complete passes then split into end zone to score; encourages penetration passes.
progressions: Reduce end zone; add touch limit.
regressions: Enlarge end zone; allow extra touch.

name: Third-Man Combination
description: Player A passes to B, B sets to C (third man) who plays forward; builds advanced combinations.
progressions: Add defender; require one-touch set.
regressions: Pattern without defender; allow extra touch.

name: Passing Under Pressure Box
description: Players pass in small grid while 1–2 pressers force quick decisions.
progressions: Add presser; reduce space; touch limit.

name: Two-Ball Rhythm Passing
description: Two balls circulate simultaneously; players must scan and communicate to avoid collisions.
key_coaching_points: Scan constantly;Call for ball;Move after pass
progressions: Three balls; one-touch only.
regressions: Back to one ball; slower tempo.

name: Receive + Split Pass
description: Player receives and plays a splitting pass through a gate to a runner.
key_coaching_points: Check shoulder;First touch to line up pass;Disguise
progressions: Add defender; narrow gate.

name: Cross-Field Passing (Lofted)
description: Lofted diagonal pass to opposite target; focus on technique and landing area.
key_coaching_points: Lean back slightly;Contact under ball;Aim for space
progressions: Add moving receiver; add pressure on passer.

name: One-Touch in a Circle
description: Players in circle play one-touch passes around while scanning and adjusting angles.
progressions: Add second ball; reverse direction on cue.

name: Wall Pass + Finish (Combo)
description: Player plays wall pass then shoots first time or after one touch; simulates combination to goal.
key_coaching_points: Weight of set pass;Time run;Finish quickly
progressions: Add defender; one-touch finish only.

name: Passing Accuracy Targets (Numbers)
description: Players pass to numbered targets or cones to build accuracy and focus.
progressions: Increase distance; add weak-foot scoring.

name: Stationary Shooting Technique
description: Reps from a stationary ball focusing on body shape, contact, and placement.
key_coaching_points: Plant foot beside ball;Head over ball;Pick corner
progressions: Add targets; alternate weak foot.

name: Dribble + Shoot
description: Dribble into a shooting lane and finish with focus on first touch into space.
key_coaching_points: Touch out of feet;Eyes on target;Follow through
progressions: Add move before shot; add time limit.

name: First-Time Finishing (Pass Across)
description: Player finishes first time from a square pass across the box.
key_coaching_points: Arrive on time;Open hips;Finish low and placed
progressions: Add defender pressure; one-touch only.

name: Angle Finishing (Wide)
description: Finish from an angle (wing) learning far-post vs near-post decisions.
progressions: Add GK; add defender chase.

name: Cut-Back Finish
description: Wide player drives then cuts back to trailing runner for finish.
key_coaching_points: Timing of run;Quality cut-back;Finish first time if possible
progressions: Add defender; add GK.

name: Volley Technique (Toss)
description: Toss ball and strike volley focusing on clean contact and balance.
key_coaching_points: Eyes on ball;Lock ankle;Body over strike
progressions: Add moving serve; alternate feet.

name: Half-Volley (Bounce) Finish
description: Strike the ball just after it bounces to train timing and technique.
progressions: Increase distance; add target zones.

name: Finishing Through Cones (Gate Shot)
description: Players must shoot through a cone gate before hitting goal to encourage accuracy.
key_coaching_points: Pick gate;Head down at contact;Controlled power
progressions: Smaller gate; add time limit.

name: 1v1 Breakaway Finish
description: Attacker dribbles in on goal and finishes with decision (place, power, chip).
key_coaching_points: Last touch out of feet;Head up;Finish early
progressions: Add chasing defender; add GK decisions.

name: Small-Sided Finishing Game 3v3
description: Fast 3v3 game with lots of shots; encourages quick finishing and transitions.
key_coaching_points: Shoot when open;Quick transition;Support the ball
progressions: Touch limit in attacking half.

name: Near-Post/Far-Post Decision Drill
description: Coach calls 'near' or 'far' late; player must adjust finish quickly.
progressions: Live GK; reduce reaction time.

name: Cross + Finish (Two Runners)
description: Wide service with near-post and far-post runners finishing first time.
progressions: Add defender; add GK.

name: Shooting on the Move (Diagonal)
description: Dribble diagonally and shoot across body; trains mechanics while moving.
progressions: Add defender cone; add weak foot.

name: Rebound Finishing (Second Ball)
description: First shot creates rebound; second player finishes rebound quickly.
progressions: Add defender; one-touch only.

name: Defensive Shuffle Footwork
description: Side-to-side shuffles staying low and balanced to build defensive movement mechanics.
key_coaching_points: Low hips;Quick small steps;No crossing feet
progressions: Add reaction cue; add ball pressure shadow.

name: Close-Out & Contain
description: Defender sprints to close down attacker then slows to contain and force sideways.
progressions: Add live tackle; add scoring line for attacker.

name: 1v1 Defending Channel
description: Defender forces attacker down narrow channel and tries to win ball or delay.
progressions: Narrow channel; add time limit.

name: Delay & Recover (2v2)
description: 2v2 defending with focus on delaying, covering, and recovering shape after being beaten.
progressions: Add transition rule; reduce space.
regressions: No goals; just win and dribble out.

name: Pressing Triggers Walkthrough
description: Team practices when to press (bad touch, back pass) and how to angle runs.
progressions: Add live play; add scoring for forced turnovers.

name: Defensive Transition 3v2
description: Defenders recover against 3 attackers; focus on delay and protect middle.
progressions: Add fourth attacker; add time limit.

name: Tackling Technique (Poke/Block)
description: Controlled tackling reps focusing on poke tackle and block tackle timing.
progressions: Add live 1v1; add scoring.

name: Backpedal + Turn Sprint
description: Defenders backpedal then turn and sprint to simulate tracking runs.
progressions: Add ball and pass to chase.

name: Intercepting Passing Lanes
description: Defenders learn to read body cues and step into lanes to intercept.
progressions: Make play live; add counter goals.

name: Block the Shot Lane
description: Defender positions to block shooting lane while staying able to tackle.
key_coaching_points: Angle body;Stay close enough;Don’t dive in
progressions: Add live 1v1 to goal.

name: Scanning Grid (Color/Number)
description: Players dribble while scanning and reacting to called colors/numbers at the edge of grid.
progressions: Add two cues; add pass on cue.

name: Find the Free Player (4v4+2)
description: Possession game with neutrals to teach finding overloads and switching play.
progressions: Touch limit; smaller grid.

name: Build-Out Pattern (GK to Mid)
description: Structured pattern to play out from the back through midfield targets.
key_coaching_points: Open body shape;Support angles;Play away from pressure
progressions: Add live pressers; add constraints.

name: Switch of Play Game (End Zones)
description: Score by moving ball from one end zone to the other; encourages switching.
key_coaching_points: Scan far side;Move ball quickly;Stay wide
progressions: Touch limit; add defender in end zone.

name: Counterpress 5-Second Rule
description: After losing ball, team has 5 seconds to win it back; trains counterpress habits.
key_coaching_points: Immediate reaction;Nearest player presses;Cover passing lanes
progressions: Reduce to 3 seconds; smaller grid.

name: Compactness Lines (Defense Shape)
description: Team moves as a unit to maintain compact distance between lines and laterally.
progressions: Add ball and live attackers.

name: Overload to Finish (4v3)
description: Attacking overload focusing on creating shot via quick combination and decision making.
progressions: Touch limit; add recovery defender.

name: Third-Man Run Game (3 Zones)
description: To enter next zone, a third-man run must receive; encourages off-ball movement.
progressions: Touch limit; reduce space.

name: Finishing Decision (Shoot/Slip/Recycle)
description: Small-sided attack where player must decide to shoot, slip pass, or recycle based on pressure.
progressions: Add defender; reduce touches.

name: Set-Piece Walkthrough (Corners)
description: Organize roles for corners (near, far, edge) and rehearse timing and delivery.
progressions: Add defenders; live delivery under pressure.

name: Agility Ladder – Basic Patterns
description: Footwork patterns (in-in-out-out, one foot each) to improve coordination and speed.
progressions: Add ball carry after ladder; add reaction finish.

name: Cone Acceleration Sprints
description: Short 5–15 yard sprints focusing on explosive first steps.
progressions: Add ball at end; add competition races.

name: Reaction Sprint (Visual Cue)
description: Players start in ready stance and sprint when coach raises a color/hand signal.
key_coaching_points: Ready position;Explode on cue;Run through line
progressions: Add change of direction; add ball pickup.

name: 5-10-5 Shuttle
description: Classic shuttle for lateral acceleration and deceleration control.
key_coaching_points: Low hips;Plant outside foot;Explode out of turns
progressions: Add ball carry; add time targets.

name: T-Drill (Change of Direction)
description: Sprint forward, shuffle laterally, backpedal; trains multi-direction footwork.
key_coaching_points: Stay low on shuffles;Quick feet;Control deceleration
progressions: Add ball; add reaction call to choose direction.

name: Plyo: Skater Jumps
description: Lateral jumps landing on one foot to build stability and power for cutting.
progressions: Add distance; add ball catch on landing.

name: Sprint + Decel Box
description: Sprint then decelerate into small box under control; reduces injury and improves control.
key_coaching_points: Chop steps to slow;Stay balanced;Control stop
progressions: Add turn on stop; add ball.

name: Curved Runs (Pressing Angles)
description: Players practice curved sprint lines to block passing lanes while pressing.
progressions: Add ball carrier; add decision of press trigger.

name: Sprint Relay With Ball
description: Teams race while dribbling; emphasizes speed control and teamwork.
progressions: Add turns; add weak-foot only leg.

name: Quick Turns (3 Cone) COD
description: Sprint to cone, sharp turn, sprint to next; repeat to build change-of-direction speed.
key_coaching_points: Lower hips on turn;Plant outside foot;Explode out
progressions: Add ball carry; reduce rest.

name: Ball Mastery Intervals (30/30)
description: 30 seconds high-intensity touches, 30 seconds rest; repeat to build soccer fitness with ball.
progressions: 40/20 rounds; add weak-foot only rounds.

name: Dribble-Sprint Cycles
description: Dribble 15 yards then sprint 15 yards repeatedly to simulate match bursts.
progressions: Add turn; add finish at end.

name: Small-Sided Conditioning 4v4
description: High-tempo small-sided game for conditioning with decision making under fatigue.
progressions: Touch limit; smaller field.

name: Tempo Runs (On/Off)
description: Alternating moderate and fast runs to build aerobic base for soccer.
progressions: Increase fast intervals; add ball carry on moderate sections.

name: Defensive Press Waves
description: Repeated pressing waves: team presses, wins ball, attacks quickly; repeat for conditioning.
progressions: Reduce rest; add scoring constraints.

name: Finishing Under Fatigue
description: Players do a short sprint then finish; trains composure while tired.
key_coaching_points: Head up;Technique under fatigue;Quick setup touch
progressions: Add defender; add time target.

name: Circuit: Core + Ball
description: Core stations (plank, dead bug) paired with ball touches between stations.
progressions: Add more stations; reduce rest.

name: Sprint Repeaters (10x10)
description: 10 x 10-second sprints with short recovery to build repeat-sprint ability.
progressions: Add direction changes; reduce rest.

name: GK Handling: W-Scoop
description: Goalkeepers practice proper hand shape and scooping technique for low balls.
key_coaching_points: Hands behind ball;Elbows in;Secure to chest
progressions: Add movement; add bounce shots.

name: GK Footwork: Set Position Steps
description: Small steps to get set, balanced stance, and ready hands before shots.
progressions: Add lateral shuffles; add reaction saves.

name: GK Diving Basics (Side Collapse)
description: Low diving technique to smother balls to either side safely.
key_coaching_points: Drive knee down;Hands to ball;Land on side
progressions: Increase distance; add rebounds.

name: GK Distribution: Side Volley/Throw
description: Practice accurate throws and volleys to targets for build-out play.
progressions: Add pressure timer; longer distances.

name: GK 1v1 Breakaway Saves
description: GK practices narrowing angle and timing for 1v1 situations.
progressions: Add attacker feints; add rebound finishing.

name: GK Cross Handling (Near/Far)
description: GK handles crosses: claim, punch, or hold while reading flight and traffic.
progressions: Add live attackers/defenders.
